content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Mr. Li. As the landlord, I am very particular about the rental price of my property. May I ask what you are willing to pay per month for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 300 Euros per month, but I am open to negotiate if there is room for compromise.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Li. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must say that 300 Euros per month is a bit low for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. However, I am willing to listen to your proposal and see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. What are your thoughts on this?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand that the apartment is in a good location, so I am willing to pay more. However, I am looking for a long term rental agreement, so I would like to get a good deal. What are your thoughts on this?

I also have a question, is it possible to negotiate the rental price after signing the lease agreement?

Thank you for your time.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your understanding, Mr. Li. I agree that the location of the apartment is certainly a selling point, and I am willing to consider your offer of 300 Euros per month as a starting point for our negotiations.

As for your question, it is possible to negotiate the rental price after signing the lease agreement, but it would depend on the specific terms of the agreement. It is always best to discuss any potential changes to the rental price with your landlord before signing the lease to avoid any misunderstandings or disputes in the future.

In terms of a long-term rental agreement, I am definitely open to discussing the possibility of a lower rental price in exchange for a longer lease term. Please let me know what you are thinking, and we can see if we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
